justification: Rationale is A-centric and barely models B’s beliefs. B values deep‑threat WRs and consensus safety; Foster is a slot possession WR and Nguyen isn’t a clear deep threat, plus he has a tough playoff schedule—misaligned with B’s stated preferences and schedule focus. B also risks thinning RB depth by giving up a Tier 2 ascending back while already holding several WRs. The trade is feasible on value, but the explanation lacks detail on B’s incentives or constraints.
